content:
Hello,
I am a rising sophomore at Duke University that is working with Lean on a summer research program. I also have some prior experience with other proof assistants like Coq and Idris, as well as significant experience with functional programming (Haskell).
I would like to contribute orthogonality on affine subspaces to mathlib, which should close #5539. I have already proven some of the desired lemmas, so I think that I should be able to go through with this.
Could I please get write access to non-master branches for this? My GitHub username is MithicSpirit (yes, it is with an "i" instead of a "y"). Considering the deadline on freezing mathlib3 is almost up I think that it would make more sense for this to be on mathlib4 if that is possible; the code for this isn't very difficult to convert between the two versions so this is not that significant (although I do prefer working with Lean4).
Yes please make any future PRs to mathlib4 only! @maintainers can MithicSpirit have push access to mathlib4?
Ricardo Prado Cunha has marked this topic as resolved.
